org.biosino.CHS.image
类 LPAlg

java.lang.Object
  org.biosino.CHS.image.LPAlg

public class LPAlg
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to caculate the locations for gene labels given the locations of genes.

构造函数摘要
LPAlg()
           
 
方法摘要
static double[] getLabLoc(double[] x, double dist)
          Given gene locations (x0, x1, x2, x3) et al (double[] x), calculate their corresponding label locations (y0, y1, y2, y3).

构造函数详细信息

public LPAlg()
方法详细信息

getLabLoc

public static double[] getLabLoc(double[] x,
                                 double dist)
Given gene locations (x0, x1, x2, x3) et al (double[] x), calculate their corresponding label locations (y0, y1, y2, y3). Both types of locations can be negative.The distance between two neigboring lables must be greater than (double dist) to avoid overlap. Linear programming is used to achieve the goal.

参数：
x - gene locations, which must be ascendent ordered.
dist - the minimum distance between neigboring lables, which must be positive.
返回：
corresponding label locations; null if wrong parameters are provided or exception happens.
